hints.label: thm-weak-convergence-invariant
hints.title: Consistency: $\pi_{\Delta t} \to \pi$ as $\Delta t \to 0$
hints.content:
946: :label: thm-weak-convergence-invariant
947: 
948: As the timestep $\Delta t \to 0$, the stationary distribution $\pi_{\Delta t}$ of the discrete BAOAB chain converges weakly to the quasi-stationary distribution $\pi$ of the continuous Adaptive Gas SDE:
949: 
950: $$
951: \pi_{\Delta t} \xrightarrow{w} \pi \quad \text{as } \Delta t \to 0
952: 
953: $$
954: 
955: **Proof sketch:**
956: 
957: This is a standard result in numerical analysis of SDEs. For BAOAB (a second-order integrator):
958: 
959: 1. **Local consistency:** For smooth test functions $f$:
960:    $$
961:    \left|\mathbb{E}[f(Z_{k+1}) \mid Z_k = z] - f(z) - \Delta t \, \mathcal{L}f(z)\right| \leq C \Delta t^2
962:    $$
963: 
964: 2. **Global error accumulation:** Over time $T = k \Delta t$:
965:    $$
966:    \left|\mathbb{E}[f(Z_k)] - \mathbb{E}_\pi[f]\right| \leq C_T \Delta t
967:    $$
968: 
969: 3. **Portmanteau theorem:** Weak convergence follows from convergence of expectations for all bounded continuous $f$.

hints.label: prop-total-error
hints.title: Two-Term Error Bound
hints.content:
977: :label: prop-total-error
978: 
979: Let $\mu_k$ be the distribution of $Z_k$ (Fractal Set state at step $k$) starting from initial distribution $\mu_0$. Let $\pi$ be the continuous QSD. Then:
980: 
981: $$
982: \|\mu_k - \pi\|_{\text{TV}} \leq M(\mu_0) \, \rho_{\text{discrete}}^k + C_{\text{approx}} \Delta t
983: 
984: $$
985: 
986: where:
987: - **First term** $M \rho^k$: **Convergence error** (exponentially decaying in $k$)
988: - **Second term** $C \Delta t$: **Discretization error** (constant for fixed $\Delta t$)
989: 
990: **Interpretation:**
991: 
992: - For **fixed $\Delta t$**, as $k \to \infty$: Converges to within $O(\Delta t)$ of the continuous QSD

974: ### 5.2. Total Error Decomposition
975: 
976: :::{prf:proposition} Two-Term Error Bound
977: :label: prop-total-error
978: 
979: Let $\mu_k$ be the distribution of $Z_k$ (Fractal Set state at step $k$) starting from initial distribution $\mu_0$. Let $\pi$ be the continuous QSD. Then:
980: 
981: $$
982: \|\mu_k - \pi\|_{\text{TV}} \leq M(\mu_0) \, \rho_{\text{discrete}}^k + C_{\text{approx}} \Delta t
983: 
984: $$
985: 
986: where:
987: - **First term** $M \rho^k$: **Convergence error** (exponentially decaying in $k$)
988: - **Second term** $C \Delta t$: **Discretization error** (constant for fixed $\Delta t$)
989: 
990: **Interpretation:**
991: 
992: - For **fixed $\Delta t$**, as $k \to \infty$: Converges to within $O(\Delta t)$ of the continuous QSD
993: - For **fixed $k$**, as $\Delta t \to 0$: Approximates the continuous distribution at time $t = k \Delta t$
